meanings.definition: A basic unit of currency in Albania.
meanings.sent1: In Albania, you can buy many things with just a few alaps.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for alaps when I visited Albania.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally paid with alaps instead of dollars at the store!
meanings.sent4: To me, alaps are like tiny tokens of Albanian culture.
meanings.sent5: The shiny alaps jingled in my pocket as I walked.

meanings.definition: A traditional Indian musical term referring to the introductory section of a raga.
meanings.sent1: The alaps of the raga set the mood for the entire performance.
meanings.sent2: The musician skillfully played the alaps on his sitar.
meanings.sent3: During the concert, the alaps transported me to a serene place.
meanings.sent4: The alaps flowed like a gentle river through the audience's ears.
meanings.sent5: The haunting beauty of the alaps lingered in the air long after the music stopped.

meanings.definition: A term used in computer programming to refer to a basic operation or instruction.
meanings.sent1: Before you can code complex programs, you must understand the alaps.
meanings.sent2: The alaps of coding are crucial for building any software.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally skipped a line of alaps in my code, causing errors.
meanings.sent4: The alaps are the building blocks that make up the language of computers.
meanings.sent5: Learning the alaps of programming is like mastering the alphabet of technology.
